Camera.Triple:: 50 MP, f/1.7, 23mm (wide), 1/1.31", 1.2µm, dual pixel PDAF, OIS 50 MP, f/3.0, 115mm (periscope telephoto), 1/2.76", 0.64µm, PDAF (30cm - ∞), OIS, 5x optical zoom 50 MP, f/2.4, 18mm, 102˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.88", 0.61µm

Design.Build:: Glass front (Poco Shield Glass), aluminum alloy frame, fiber-reinforced plastic back or silicone polymer back
Design.SIM:: Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time) Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time)
Design.Others:: IP68 dust tight and water resistant (immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

Battery.Charging:: 100W wired, PD3.0, QC3+, 100W PPS, 100% in 38 mins 50W wireless, 50% in 31 mins 22.5W reverse wireless

Display.Type:: AMOLED, 68B colors, 2560Hz PWM, 120Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, 2000 nits (HBM), 3500 nits (peak)

Hardware.Chipset:: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)
Hardware.CPU:: Octa-core (2x4.6 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.62 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

Multimedia.Loudspeaker:: Yes, with stereo speakers (with Dolby Atmos)
Multimedia.3.5mm jack:: No Tuned by Bose Bose 2.1 stereo sound system with a woofer 24-bit/192kHz Hi-Res & Hi-Res wireless audio

Connectivity & Features.GPS:: GPS (L1+L5), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L5), GLONASS
Connectivity & Features.Sensors:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, proximity, gyro, compass
